rule_name.description:
Description

Requires user defined Javadoc tag to be present in Javadoc comment with
defined format. To define the format for a tag, set property tagFormat to a regular
expression. Property tagSeverity is used for severity of events when the tag exists.
rule_name.option:
tag, Specify the name of tag., String, null
tagFormat, Specify the regexp to match tag content., Pattern, null
tagSeverity, Specify the severity level when tag is found and printed., SeverityLevel, info
tokens, tokens to check, subset of tokens
